lines.text: I am the Nightrider. I'm a fuel injected suicide machine. I am the rocker, I am the roller, I am the out-of-controller!
[the Kid is handcuffed to a car that's about to explode]
The chain in those handcuffs is high-tensile steel. It'd take you ten minutes to hack through it with this. Now, if you're lucky, you could hack through your ankle in five minutes. Go.
[the hacksaw is dropped next to The Kid, and Max limps off]
They say people don't believe in heroes anymore. Well damn them! You and me, Max, we're gonna give them back their heroes!
Ah, Fif. Do you really expect me to go for that crap?
You gotta admit I sounded good there for a minute, huh?
I'm scared, Fif. You know why? It's that rat circus out there. I'm beginning to enjoy it.
What is this, bonny week?
Look. Any longer out on that road and I'm one of them, you know? A terminal crazy... only I got a bronze badge to say I'm one of the good guys.
That must be your friend over there. They didn't leave much of him.
Must've cut his heart out, eh?
Yes. That's what I meant. Poor bastard!

[whirls on the Station Manager]
The Nightrider. That is his name... the Nightrider.

[frightened]
The NightRider.
Remember him when you look at the night sky!
I will.
Take your hat off.
Anything you say.
Anything I say. What a wonderful philosophy you have. Take him away.

[via radio]
Max.

[via radio]
Go ahead.
We are 100% SNAFU.
You ok?
Nothin' a year in the tropics wouldn't fix.
Much damage?

[via radio]
You should see the damage, bronze. Huh? metal damage, brain damage. Heheheh. You listen bronze. I am the Nightrider. I'm a fuel injected suicide machine. I am the rocker, I am the roller, I am the out-of-controller! I'm the Nightrider, baby,
[unintelligible]
, and we ain't never comin' back!
[Max hands Fifi his letter of resignation]
What's this?
I'm through.
Again?
No, not again. I'm through. I'm quitting.
Sit down.
I didn't come here to dicuss it, I came here to say it. I'm through.
Now just a minute! Alright, so the Goose bought it, but that's the way he always came in the world...
-Off beat!
Jimmy the Goose, larger than life and twice as ugly!
That there is Cundalini... and Cundalini wants his hand back!

The Toecutter - he knows who I am. I am the Nightrider! I am the chosen one. The mighty hand of vengeance, sent down to strike the unroadworthy! I'm hotter than a rollin' dice. Step right up, chum, and watch the kid lay down the rubber road, ride to freedom!

[to old woman]
I think we've got some hoon trouble...
Main force Patrol.
Were out of the game unable to continue pursuit.
You better send a Meat Truck. Charlie's copped a saucepan in the throat.
[the gang is holding Sprog]

[pleading]
Please. Give me my baby.

[feigning concern]
Jessie, Jessie, Jessie. You've not got a sense of humor.
[whispering]
You've got a pretty face, though. Awful pretty. Awful pretty.
[brightly]
I suppose you don't need a sense of humor with a pretty face. The only trouble is though, Missy, if you should...
[wiping his face roughly with his hand, then whispering]
lose the face.
I just can't get it clear in my head, Jess. He was so full of living, you know? He ran a franchise on it. Now there's nothing. And here I am trying to put sense to it, when I know there isn't any.
[a car that the bikers demolished earlier has been towed to the Halls of Justice]
Hey Mister! What happened to the car?
What do you think happened?
Looks like it's been chewed up and spat out.
Perhaps it was a result of anxiety.

[describing the supercharged Interceptor that's idling, in particular the supercharger itself]
You can shut the gate on this one, Maxie... it's the duck's guts!

[excitedly]
She sucks nitro... with Phase 4 heads! 600 horsepower through the wheels! She's meanness set to music and the bitch is born to run!

[looking at Max just staring at the engine]
He's in a coma, man!
Whacked right out of his skull man! He ain't never comin' back!
[Cundalini and Mudguts molest a female mannequin]

[to Toecutter]
Joviality is a game of children.
[Toecutter fires shotgun into the air]
Mudguts, get out of there. Cundalini, put her against the post.
[indicating mannequin]
We have a problem here. She... is not... what she seems. Bubba Zanetti has it on good authority. She's sent by the bronze. Full of treachery. The bronze... take our pride.
[Bubba takes aim at the mannequin with a pistol. Suddenly Johnny grabs the Toecutter's shotgun and blasts her]

[kneeling in front]
If you're going to waste the bronze, you gotta do it big!
You just don't have the style, do ya. Chickenshit.
[last lines]

[Max limps away after handcuffing Johnny to the car, leaking gas next to a fire]
You're *mad*, man! You think I look silly, don't ya? Ha, ha! Don't bring this on me, man!
[sobbing]
Don't do this to me, please! Aw, Sweet Jesus! I was sick! Don't bring this on me, please!
That scag and his floozie, they're gonna die!
They say people don't believe in heroes anymore. Well, damn them! You and me, Max, we're gonna give 'em back their heroes!
We're here to meet a friend. Comin' on the train.
Nothin' comin' on the train except a couple of crates and a, uh, coffin!
Our friend.
What a turkey! Hey, fella! You're a turkey!

It was like slow motion. He leaves his seat and goes through the windshield, headfirst straight into the tree, right? And then bounces back through the windshield. And by the time we got to him, he was just sitting there, trying to scream with his face ripped off.
[pause]
What's the matter?
Not hungry anymore.
Give it here.
We'll See you on the road, skag! We'll See you on the road like we saw The Nightrider!
We remember The Nightrider! And we know who you are!
You've seen it!... You've heard it!... and you're still asking questions?

[sarcastically, as his superior walks out of earshot]
Thanks, Labatouche. You're a real human being.
Like the sign says, "speed's just a question of money. How fast you wanna go?"

[about Cundalini's hand]
Well, unless someone makes a claim for it, I figure it's lost property.
[after Roop and Charlie crash into a bystander's van]
Boy, we're really going to get it this time. He had his indicator on.
Shut up!
People don't believe in heroes anymore.
I know McCaffee, you want to give them back their heroes. You will not try this one on me again, I do not enjoy wasting money. Goodbye and good luck.
Thanks Labatouche, you're a real human being.

[watching Jessie get out of her car with Sprog]
Look what's turned up for Sunday dinner.
Main course and dessert!
And my favorite kind... female!

[as Toecutter is harassing Jessie]
Watch the tongue, lovable, I've seen him lick his own eyebrow clean!
